# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow.optimizers



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/optimizers.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/python/ops/optimizers.py).

Probabilistic optimizer modules.

See <a href="../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/optimizers"><code>tf.contrib.bayesflow.optimizers</code></a>.

## Classes

[`class SGLDOptimizer`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/optimizers/SGLDOptimizer): An optimizer module for stochastic gradient Langevin dynamics.

[`class VariationalSGDOptimizer`](../../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/optimizers/VariationalSGDOptimizer): An optimizer module for constant stochastic gradient descent.
